--- DateTime: 2018/4/10 16:20
---
local NumericUtils = {}

function NumericUtils.fromhex(str)
    return str:gsub('..',function(c)
        return string.char(tonumber(cc, 16))
    end)
end

function NumericUtils.tohex(str)
    return str:gsub('.',function(c)
        return string.format('%02X', string.byte(c))
    end)
end

return NumericUtils
